name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise-canceling technology and up to 30 hours of battery life. Perfect for travel or office use, providing clear and immersive sound.

name: Smartwatch Pro
description: Advanced smartwatch with health tracking, GPS, and customizable watch faces. Compatible with both iOS and Android devices. Monitor your health and stay connected.

name: 4K Ultra HD TV
description: Experience stunning picture quality with this 55-inch 4K Ultra HD television. Features smart functionality, HDR support, and integrated streaming apps.

name: Gaming Laptop
description: Powerful gaming laptop with a high-refresh-rate display, dedicated graphics, and ultra-fast processor. Optimized for gaming and professional applications.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with superior sound quality and a durable, waterproof design. Perfect for outdoor adventures or parties. Battery lasts up to 20 hours.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Sleek fitness tracker that monitors your heart rate, sleep patterns, and activity levels. Syncs with your smartphone to help you reach your fitness goals.

name: Noise Cancelling Earbuds
description: Wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and crystal-clear sound. Comfortable fit and long battery life, perfect for commuters and travelers.

name: Smart Home Hub
description: All-in-one smart home hub compatible with most smart devices. Control your devices with voice commands and manage home automation from your smartphone.

name: Wireless Charger
description: Fast wireless charger compatible with most smartphones and wireless earbuds. Compact design for desk or bedside use. Charges through most phone cases.

name: Electric Scooter
description: Eco-friendly electric scooter with a range of 25 miles on a single charge. Perfect for urban commuting or weekend rides. Stylish design with safety features.

name: Smart Thermostat
description: Save energy and control your home's temperature remotely with this smart thermostat. Works with voice assistants and offers programmable temperature schedules.

name: VR Headset
description: Immersive virtual reality headset with wide field of view and precise tracking. Experience VR gaming, simulations, and media like never before.

name: Robot Vacuum
description: Automatic robot vacuum with intelligent navigation and multi-surface cleaning. Schedule cleanings and control it remotely through your smartphone.

name: Streaming Media Player
description: Stream your favorite shows, movies, and music with this compact media player. Supports 4K HDR and comes with built-in apps like Netflix, Hulu, and more.

name: Smart Doorbell
description: See who's at your door with this HD video doorbell. Features two-way audio, motion detection, and mobile alerts. Compatible with smart home systems.

name: Action Camera
description: Compact and waterproof action camera for capturing high-quality videos and photos. Perfect for extreme sports, travel, and outdoor adventures.

name: E-reader
description: Lightweight e-reader with a high-resolution, glare-free display. Store thousands of books and read in direct sunlight or low-light environments.

name: Smart Lock
description: Upgrade your home security with this keyless smart lock. Control access from anywhere and give temporary keys to guests or family members.

name: Home Security Camera
description: Wireless security camera with motion detection, night vision, and cloud storage. View live video feeds and receive alerts on your smartphone.

name: Electric Kettle
description: Fast-boiling electric kettle with temperature control and auto shut-off. Perfect for making tea, coffee, or instant meals in minutes.

name: Smart Light Bulbs
description: Energy-efficient smart light bulbs that can be controlled via app or voice assistants. Customize brightness and color to suit any mood or setting.

name: Portable Projector
description: Compact portable projector with full HD resolution and wireless connectivity. Perfect for home theater setups, outdoor movies, or presentations.

name: Wireless Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with adjustable sensitivity and long battery life. Great for both gaming and office work, offering precise control and comfort.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: High-performance mechanical keyboard with customizable RGB lighting and tactile feedback. Designed for gaming and typing enthusiasts.

name: External Hard Drive
description: Portable external hard drive with 2TB storage capacity. Back up your files, photos, and videos securely and access them from any device.

name: Digital Photo Frame
description: Display your favorite memories with this digital photo frame. Features high-resolution display, Wi-Fi connectivity, and customizable slideshows.

name: Portable Blender
description: Compact portable blender perfect for making smoothies and shakes on the go. USB rechargeable and easy to clean. Ideal for healthy lifestyles.

name: Instant Pot
description: Multi-functional electric pressure cooker that replaces several kitchen appliances. Prepare meals faster with one-touch controls for various dishes.

name: Smart Coffee Maker
description: Brew your coffee with a smart coffee maker. Set schedules, control brew strength, and get notifications when your coffee is ready.

name: Digital Air Fryer
description: Healthy cooking made easy with this digital air fryer. Fry, bake, and grill your favorite foods with little to no oil. Features adjustable temperature controls.

name: Wi-Fi Range Extender
description: Boost your Wi-Fi signal and eliminate dead zones in your home with this range extender. Easy to set up and compatible with all routers.

name: Electric Shaver
description: Rechargeable electric shaver with multiple heads for a close and comfortable shave. Waterproof design, perfect for wet or dry use.

name: Portable Power Bank
description: High-capacity portable power bank with fast charging capability. Keep your devices charged while on the go, with multiple USB ports.

name: Tablet Stand
description: Adjustable tablet stand for comfortable viewing and typing angles. Compatible with most tablets and e-readers. Lightweight and portable.

name: Portable Air Purifier
description: Compact air purifier with HEPA filter for cleaning the air in small spaces. Ideal for bedrooms, offices, or travel. Reduces allergens and odors.

name: Smart Scale
description: Track your weight, body fat, and other health metrics with this smart scale. Syncs with fitness apps and offers detailed insights on your progress.

name: Waterproof Phone Case
description: Protect your phone from water, dust, and sand with this waterproof phone case. Perfect for swimming, snorkeling, or beach trips.

name: Smart Mirror
description: High-tech smart mirror with built-in lighting and interactive features. Connect to your smart home system for voice commands and notifications.

name: Noise-Cancelling Sleep Mask
description: Comfortable sleep mask with built-in noise-cancelling headphones. Enjoy restful sleep by blocking out light and unwanted sounds.

name: Smart Ceiling Fan
description: Energy-efficient ceiling fan with smart controls. Set schedules, adjust speed, and control lighting from your smartphone or voice assistant.

name: Digital Meat Thermometer
description: Ensure perfect cooking with this instant-read digital meat thermometer. Ideal for grilling, baking, and roasting, offering accurate temperature readings.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Comfortable and adjustable ergonomic office chair designed for long hours of sitting. Offers lumbar support and breathable mesh back.

name: Portable Air Conditioner
description: Stay cool with this portable air conditioner. Features multiple fan speeds, dehumidifying mode, and easy installation in any room.

name: Electric Toothbrush
description: Rechargeable electric toothbrush with multiple brushing modes and a smart timer. Promotes better oral hygiene with efficient cleaning.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Slim wireless charging pad compatible with most smartphones and earbuds. Features fast charging capability and sleek design for minimal desk clutter.
